topic.title: YEAR AND MONTH FIRST STARTED ANTIRETROVIRAL THERAPY
topic.shortdesc: For the Improving Access to Psychological Therapies Data Set, it is expected that the PATIENT will always know the year and month that the current mental health problem was first experienced, therefore there is no default code.
